file_content.text: [These must be the remains of Harris, as Dr. Delau described.]
[And just beyond her, the newly discovered artifact.]
[Harris's injuries clearly show that she was attacked by something quite large, consistent with Dr. Delau's report of a Massassi Relic Keeper.]
[It also seems that the local cave wildlife has been picking at Harris's body in the meanwhile.]
[Search the body for the missing artifacts]
[Searching a half-chewed pocket, you find what appears to be the Sith medallion Dr. Delau described in her notes.]

[Unfortunately, the medallion has an empty socket in the forehead instead of a crystal as Dr. Delau noted. Fresh scoring around the socket suggests that the gem was broken off or otherwise picked out.]
[You find no sign of the missing relic tablet on Harris's body or in the immediate vicinity.]
(Force Sensitive Background) [Concentrating on the medallion, you can sense a similar force disturbance nearby in the cave... but it feels almost alive, not an inanimate object.]
